CustomField.description: **System Calculated/Conditional/Override** The date to use as the Invoice Date for any Invoice generated from the Sales Order only applies to Sales Orders where Is Scheduled is not set to true.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: **System Calculated/Conditional/Override** The date to use as the Invoice Date for any Invoice generated from the Sales Order only applies to Sales Orders where Is Scheduled is not set to true.
CustomField.label: Invoice Date
